markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aquatic Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2605) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean. You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416), or you gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) if your ancestry already has low-light vision.

**Special** If your ancestry has neither low-light vision nor darkvision, you can take this ancestry feat a second time to gain darkvision. You can't retrain out of this feat.
name: Aquatic Eyes
